landing.description: Chat is used to communicate with groups of people who think about different topics and are entertained even with tools such as sending links to see other pages, criticize and like them. There are ways to express yourself through the network, such as sending emoticons that represent; simple faces, sad, happy, surprised, screaming, crying or making gestures with parts of the face. There are also different types of chat or discussion groups.

error.password: It must contain at least one letter and 5 characters
error.minLength: It must contain at least 3 characters

home.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this chat room?
home.description: Enter the chat rooms and make friends !!!
home.update: To change the name of the room type in the new name!
